Verses: 1 theerkkadharisigaludaiya Puththiraril Oruvanukku Manaiviyaayirundha Oru Sthree Elisaavaip Paarththu: Umadhu Adiyaanaagiya En Purushan Irandhu Ponaan; Umadhu Adiyaan Karththarukku Bayandhu Nadandhaan Enbadhai Ariveer; Kadankoduththavan Ippodhu En Irandu Kumaararaiyum Thanakku Adimaigalaakkik Kolla Vandhaan Endraan.
2 elisaa Avalai Nokki: Naan Unakku Ennaseyya Vendum? Veettil Unnidaththil Enna Irukkiradhu Sol Endraan. Adharku Aval: Oru Kudam Enney Allaamal Umadhu Adiyaaludaiya Veettil Verondrum Illai Endraal.
3 appozhudhu Avan: Nee Poi, Unnudaiya Ayalveettukaarar Ellaaridaththilum Anegam Verumpaaththirangalaik Kettuvaangi,
4 ulle Poi, Un Pillaigaludan Ulle Nindru Kadhavaip Pootti, Andhap Paaththirangal Ellaavatrilum Vaarththu, Niraindhadhai Oru Pakkaththil Vai Endraan.
5 aval Avanidaththilirundhu Poi, Than Pillaigaludan Kadhavaip Poottikkondu, Ivargal Paaththirangalai Avalidaththil Kodukka, Aval Avaigalil Vaarththaal.
6 andhap Paaththirangal Niraindha Pin, Aval Than Magan Oruvanai Nokki: Innum Oru Paaththiram Konduvaa Endraal. Adharku Avan: Vere Paaththiram Illai Endraan; Appozhudhu Enney Nindru Poyitru.
7 aval Poi Dhevanudaiya Manushanukku Adhai Ariviththaal. Appozhudhu Avan: Nee Poi Andha Enneyai Vitru, Un Kadanaith Theerththu, Meendhadhaikkondu Neeyum Un Pillaigalum Jeevanampannungal Endraan.

8 pinbu Orunaal Elisaa Soonemukkup Poyirukkumpodhu, Angeyirundha Ganamporundhiya Oru Sthree Avanai Bojanampanna Varundhik Kettukkondaal; Appadiye Avan Payanappattu Varugirapodhellaam Bojanampannumpadi Ange Vandhu Thanguvaan.
9 aval Than Purushanai Nokki: Idho, Nammidaththil Eppodhum Vandhupogira Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya Ivar Parisuththavaan Endru Kaangiren.
10 naam Meththaiyinmel Oru Siriya Araiveettaik Katti, Adhil Avarukku Oru Kattilaiyum, Mejaiyaiyum, Naarkaaliyaiyum, Kuththuvilakkaiyum Vaippom; Avar Nammidaththil Varumpodhu Ange Thangalaam Endraal.
11 orunaal Avan Ange Vandhu, Andha Araiveettile Thangi, Ange Paduththukkondirundhaan.
12 avan Than Velaikkaaranaagiya Keyaasiyai Nokki: Indha Soonemiyaalai Azhaiththukkonduvaa Endraan; Avalai Azhaiththukkonduvandhaan; Aval Avanukku Munbaaga Nindraal.

13 avan Keyaasiyaip Paarththu: Idho, Ippadippatta Sagala Salakkaranaiyodum Engalai Visaariththu Varugiraaye, Unakku Naan Enna Seyyavendum? Raajaavinidaththilaavadhu Senaapadhiyinidaththilaavadhu Unakkaaga Naan Pesavendiya Kaariyam Undo Endru Avalaik Kel Endraan. Adharku Aval: En Janaththin Naduve Naan Sugamaaik Kudiyirukkiren Endraal.
14 avalukku Seyyavendiyadhu Ennavendru Keyaasiyai Avan Kettadharku; Avan, Avalukkup Pillai Illai, Aval Purushanum Periya Vayadhullavan Endraan.
15 appozhudhu Avan: Avalaik Kooppidu Endraan; Avalaik Kooppitta Podhu, Aval Vandhu Vaasarpadiyile Nindraal.

16 appozhudhu Avan: Oru Praana Urpaththikaalaththittaththile Oru Kumaaranai Anaiththuk Kondiruppaai Endraan. Adharku Aval: Edhu? Dhevanudaiya Manushanaagiya En Aandavane, Umadhu Adiyaalukku Abaththam Sollavendaam Endraal.
17 andha Sthree Karppandhariththu, Elisaa Thannode Sonnapadi, Oru Urpaththikaalaththittaththil Oru Kumaaranaip Petraal.
18 andhap Pillai Valarndhaan, Orunaal Avan Arupparukkiravargalidaththilirundha Than Thagappanandaikkup Poyirukkumpodhu,
19 than Thagappanaip Paarththu: En Thalai Nogiradhu, En Thalai Nogiradhu Endraan; Appozhudhu Avan Velaikkaaranidaththil, Ivanai Ivan Thaayinidaththil Eduththukkondupoividu Endraan.
20 avanai Eduththu, Avan Thaayinidaththil Konduponapodhu, Avan Maththiyaanamattum Aval Madiyil Irundhu Seththupponaan.
21 appozhudhu Aval Erippoi, Avanai Dhevanudaiya Manushan Kattilinmel Vaiththu, Avan Vaikkappatta Araiyin Kadhavaip Poottik Kondupoi,

22 than Purushanidaththil Aal Anuppi: Naan Seekkiramaai Dhevanudaiya Manushan Irukkum Idamattum Poivarumpadikku, Velaikkaararil Oruvanaiyum Oru Kazhudhaiyaiyum Enakku Anuppavendum Endru Sollachchonnaal.

23 appozhudhu Avan: Idhu Amaavaasiyum Alla, Oivunaalum Allave; Nee Indraikku Avaridaththukkup Pogavendiyadhu Enna Endru Ketkachchonnaan. Adharku Aval: Ellaam Saridhaan, Naan Poga Vendiyirukkiradhu Endru Solliyanuppi,
24 kazhudhaiyinmel Senamvaiththu Eri, Than Velaikkaaranai Nokki: Idhai Ottikkondupo; Naan Unakku Sonnaal Ozhiya Pogira Vazhiyil Engum Ottaththai Niruththaadhe Endru Sollip Purappattu,

25 karmel Parvadhaththilirukkira Dhevanudaiya Manushanidaththirkup Ponaal; Dhevanudaiya Manushan Dhooraththile Avalai Varakkandu, Than Velaikkaaranaagiya Keyaasiyaip Paarththu: Adho Soonemiyaal Varugiraal.
26 nee Avalukku Edhirkondu Odi, Nee Sugamaayirukkiraayaa? Un Purushan Sugamaayirukkiraanaa? Andhap Pillai Sugamaayirukkiradhaa Endru Avalidaththil Kel Endraan. Aval: Sugandhaan Endru Solli,

27 parvadhaththilirukkira Dhevanudaiya Manushanidaththil Vandhu, Avan Kaalaip Pidiththukkondaal; Appozhudhu Keyaasi Avalai Vilakkivida Vandhaan; Dhevanudaiya Manushan: Avalaith Thadukkaadhe; Aval Aaththumaa Dhukkamaayirukkiradhu; Karththar Adhai Enakku Ariviyaamal Maraiththu Vaiththaar Endraan.
28 appozhudhu Aval, Naan En Aandavanidaththil Oru Kumaaranai Vendum Endru Kettadhundaa? Enakku Abaththam Sollavendaam Endru Naan Sollavillaiyaa Endraal.

29 appozhudhu Avan Keyaasiyaip Paarththu: Nee Un Idaiyaik Kattikkondu, En Thadiyai Un Kaiyil Pidiththukkondu, Vazhiyil Oruvanai Sandhiththaalum Avanai Vinavaamalum, Unnai Oruvan Vinavinaalum Avanukku Marumozhi Sollaamalum Poi; En Thadiyai Andhap Pillaiyin Mugaththinmel Vai Endraan.
30 pillaiyin Thaayo: Naan Ummai Vidugiradhillai Endru Karththarin Jeevanaiyum Ummudaiya Jeevanaiyum Kondu Sollugiren Endraal; Appozhudhu Avan Ezhundhirundhu Aval Pinne Ponaan.

31 keyaasi Avargalukku Munne Poi, Andhath Thadiyaip Pillaiyin Mugaththinmel Vaiththaan; Aanaalum Saththamum Illai, Unarchchiyum Illai; Aagaiyaal Avan Thirumbi Avanukku Edhirkonduvandhu: Pillai Vizhikkavillai Endru Avanukku Ariviththaan.
32 elisaa Veettirkul Vandhapodhu, Idho, Andhap Pillai Avan Kattilinmel Seththukkidandhaan.
33 ulle Poith Thangal Iruvarukkum Pinnaaga Avan Kadhavaip Pootti, Karththarai Nokki Vendudhal Seydhu,

34 kittepoi, Than Vaai Pillaiyin Vaayinmelum, Than Kangal Avan Kangalinmelum, Than Ullankaigal Avan Ullankaigalinmelum Padumpadiyaaga Avanmel Kuppurap Paduththuk Kondaan; Appozhudhu Pillaiyin Udal Anal Kondadhu.
35 avan Ezhundhu, Araiveettil Ingum Angum Ulaavi, Thirumbak Kittap Poi Avanmel Kuppurappaduththaan; Appozhudhu Andhap Pillai Ezhudharam Thummith Than Kangalaith Thirandhaan.

36 appozhudhu Avan: Keyaasiyaik Kooppittu, Andha Soonemiyaalai Azhaiththukkonduvaa Endraan; Avalai Azhaiththukkonduvandhaan; Aval Avanidaththil Vandhapodhu ; Avan, Un Kumaaranai Eduththukkondu Po Endraan.
37 appozhudhu Aval Ulle Poi, Avan Paadhaththile Vizhundhu, Tharaimattum Panindhu, Than Kumaaranai Eduththuk Kondu Veliye Ponaal.

38 elisaa Kilkaalukkuth Thirumbip Poi Irukkaiyil, Dhesaththile Panjam Undaayitru; Theerkkadharisigalin Puththirar, Avanukku Munbaaga Utkaarndhirundhaargal; Avan Than Velaikkaaranai Nokki: Nee Periya Paanaiyai Aduppile Vaiththuth Theerkkadharisigalin Puththirarukkuk Koozhkaaichchu Endraan.

39 oruvan Keeraigalaip Parikka Veliyile Poi, Oru Peykkommattik Kodiyaik Kandu, Adhan Kaaigalai Madi Niraiya Aruththuvandhu, Avaigalai Arindhu Koozhppaanaiyile Pottaan; Adhu Innadhendru Avargalukkuth Theriyaadhirundhadhu.

40 saappida Adhai Janangalukku Vaarththaargal; Avargal Andhak Koozhil Eduththu Saappidugirapodhu, Adhai Saappidak Koodaamal: Dhevanudaiya Manushane, Paanaiyil Saavu Irukkiradhu Endru Saththamittaargal.
41 appozhudhu Avan, Maavaik Konduvarachcholli, Adhaip Paanaiyile Pottu, Janangal Saappidumpadi Avargalukku Vaar Endraan; Appuram Paanaiyile Thosham Illaamar Poyitru.

42 pinbu Paagaal Saleeshaavilirundhu Oru Manushan Dhevanudaiya Manushanukku Mudharpalanaana Vaarkodhumaiyin Irubadhu Appangalaiyum Thaal Kadhirgalaiyum Konduvandhaan; Appozhudhu Avan: Janangalukku Saappidakkodu Endraan.

43 adharku Avanudaiya Panividaikkaaran: Idhai Naan Nooruperukku Mun Vaippadhu Eppadi Endraan. Adharku Avan: Adhai Janangalukku Saappidak Kodu; Saappittapirpaadu Innum Meedhiyundaayirukkum Endru Karththar Sollugiraar Endraan.
44 appozhudhu Avargalukku Munbaaga Adhai Vaiththaan; Karththarudaiya Vaarththaiyinpadiye Avargal Saappittadhumandri Meedhiyum Irundhadhu.
